title: Blended Learning for Integrated Thinking and Reflective Practice in Science and Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Foundational Knowledge in Science and Mathematics
context.additional_context: A course exploring the interconnectedness of science and mathematics through online platforms and in-person classes, emphasizing integrated analysis of real-world problems and reflective thinking to design educational strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can present models that connect core concepts in science and mathematics to solve real-world problems.
Learners can document the inquiry process and write reflective journals through online and face-to-face activities.
Learners can develop science-mathematics integrated educational scenarios based on learned content and receive peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
